title: Knife, 1985-103-233, ca. 1735
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade with staright sides. Plain bolster. Silver ferrule with horizontal bands. Tapering white porcelain handle with kakiemon design in green, blue and yellow (underglaze) and red-brown overglaze. End of handle rounded with silver button cap.
